title: Calculating
text: Multiply the first equation by $$2$$, multiply the second equation by $$3$$, and add them together: $$2\left(4x-3z\right)+3\left(3y+2z\right)=2\left(-5\right)+3\times7$$

title: Calculating
text: Multiply the third equation by $$8$$ and subtract with $$3\left(8x+9y\right)=3\times11$$: $$8\left(3x+4y\right)-3\left(8x+9y\right)=8\times6-3\times11$$
